sqls.sql: insert into E12010000_LOCAL (ORG_CODE, CLINIC_ID, `NO`, DEPT_CODE, REGISTER_ID, CARDID, EMP_ID, PAT_NO, PERSONID, `NAME`, SEX, BIRTHDAY, AGE, AGE2, CF_TYPE, IDCARD, CARDNUM, CLINIC_TIME,
